memberdef.name: GET_TYPE_CASES
memberdef.initializer: if( H5Tequal(datatype_id, get_hdf5_data_type<elem>::type()) )\ { \ typeID = getTypeID<elem>(); \ } \ else

detaileddescription.para: HDF5 printer retriever class definitions This is a class accompanying the HDF5Printer which takes care of reading from output created by the HDF5Printer.
